verse: असुन्दरः सुन्दरशेखरोवा गुणैर्विहीनो गुणिनां वरो वा । द्वेषी मयि स्यात् करुणाम्बुधिर्वा कष्णः स एवाद्य गतिर्ममायम् आश्लिष्य वा पादरतां पिनष्टु मामदर्शनार्न्महतां करोतु वा यथा तथा वा विदधातु लम्पटो मत्प्राणनाथस्तु स एव नापरः
overall_meaning: Krishna, whether not beautiful or the beautiful one, whether devoid of virtues or the best among the virtuous, whether an enemy or an ocean of compassion towards me, whether Krishna or anyone else is my current goal. May he embrace me or drink the dust of my feet, may he ignore me or do great favors even as carefree, but he alone, the Lord of my life, is unmatched.
